plot: A spoof of "Harry Potter & The Goblet of Fire", wherein Harry Potter and the other three competitors fight for a cream bun. How Lord Voldemort tries to thwart this contest, and who wins in the end, forms the rest of the plot.
title: Harry Potter Spoof Movie
plot_es: A spoof of "Harry Potter & The Goblet of Fire", wherein Harry Potter and the other three competitors fight for a cream bun. How Lord Voldemort tries to thwart this contest, and who wins in the end, forms the rest of the plot.
plot_en: A spoof of "Harry Potter & The Goblet of Fire", wherein Harry Potter and the other three competitors fight for a cream bun. How Lord Voldemort tries to thwart this contest, and who wins in the end, forms the rest of the plot.

cast.role: The Dragon, Ron Weasley, Lord Voldemort
cast.name: Avinash Arivazhahan
